endpoints.description: Initiate the monitoring process for a specified chemical production line.
Retrieve the current status of the monitoring process by its identifier.
Update settings or configurations for an ongoing monitoring process.
Terminate the monitoring process identified by its unique identifier.
Access processed insights and analytics derived from real-time data.
Evaluate and retrieve quality compliance metrics for the monitored process.
Trigger notifications or alerts based on specific production parameters.
Analyze historical data to illustrate trends in production efficiency.
Archive monitored data logs for future reference or audits.
Fetch detailed information about a specific archived log by ID.
